languages.text: Смотри! Вон похититель десятины! Его нельзя убивать, целься в двигатели! Надо взять его живым!

traits.locale_text: Смотри! Вон похититель десятины! Его нельзя убивать, целься в двигатели! Надо взять его живым!

languages.text: "А вот и "Бессердечный"! Орудия — к бою, цельсь строго в двигатели, за сохранность десятины отвечаем головой!"
"Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We answer for the integrity of the tithe with our lives!"
languages.original_text: "А вот и "Бессердечный"! Орудия — к бою, цельсь строго в двигатели, за сохранность десятины отвечаем головой!"

traits.locale_text: "Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We're answering with our lives for the integrity of the tithe!"
"Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We're answering with our lives for the integrity of the tithe!"
"Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We answer for the integrity of the tithe with our lives!"
"Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We answer for the integrity of the tithe with our lives!"
"Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We answer for the integrity of the tithe with our lives!"
"Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We answer for the integrity of the tithe with our lives!"

languages.text: 「ハートレスが来るぞ！砲撃用意！エンジンを狙え！命をかけて租税を守るぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We answer for the integrity of the tithe with our lives!"

traits.locale_text: 「ハートレスが来るぞ！砲撃用意！エンジンを狙え！命をかけて租税を守るぞ！」

languages.text: "Hier kommt die Heartless! Kanonen bereit machen! Zielt nur auf die Antriebe! Wir sind mit unserem Leben für die Unversehrtheit des Zehnts verantwortlich!"
languages.original_text: "Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We answer for the integrity of the tithe with our lives!"

traits.locale_text: "Hier kommt die Heartless! Kanonen bereit machen! Zielt nur auf die Antriebe! Wir sind mit unserem Leben für die Unversehrtheit des Zehnts verantwortlich!"

languages.text: « Voilà le Sans-Cœur ! Préparez les canons ! Visez uniquement les moteurs ! Nous devons à tout prix préserver l'intégrité de la dîme ! »
languages.original_text: "Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We answer for the integrity of the tithe with our lives!"

traits.locale_text: « Voilà le Sans-Cœur ! Préparez les canons ! Visez uniquement les moteurs ! Nous devons à tout prix préserver l'intégrité de la dîme ! »

languages.text: «¡Aquí viene la Desalmada! ¡Preparad los cañones! ¡Apuntad únicamente a los motores! ¡Responderemos por la integridad del diezmo con nuestras vidas!».
languages.original_text: "Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We answer for the integrity of the tithe with our lives!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Aquí viene la Desalmada! ¡Preparad los cañones! ¡Apuntad únicamente a los motores! ¡Responderemos por la integridad del diezmo con nuestras vidas!».

languages.text: “无心号来了！宏炮就位！全力瞄准引擎！哪怕是丢了命，也得确保什一税不受任何损害！”
languages.original_text: "Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We answer for the integrity of the tithe with our lives!"

traits.locale_text: “无心号来了！宏炮就位！全力瞄准引擎！哪怕是丢了命，也得确保什一税不受任何损害！”

languages.text: "Taşkalp geliyor! Topları hazırlayın! Doğrudan motorlara nişan alın! Aşara zeval gelirse bunu canlarımızla öderiz!"
languages.original_text: "Here comes the Heartless! Ready the cannons! Aim strictly for the engines! We answer for the integrity of the tithe with our lives!"

traits.locale_text: "Taşkalp geliyor! Topları hazırlayın! Doğrudan motorlara nişan alın! Aşara zeval gelirse bunu canlarımızla öderiz!"
